changeSet.comment: migrating existing TEMPLATE permissions to restrictions
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT (TAMW_permission.id-TAMW_role.id+800) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'READ', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'INSTANCE_TEMP_LIST' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT (TAMW_permission.id-TAMW_role.id+800) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'READ', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'EDIT_RES_TEMP' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id AND TAMW_role.id NOT IN (SELECT role_id FROM TAMW_restriction WHERE permission_id = (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'INSTANCE_TEMP_LIST'));
